if exists(select * from Es_PstPerfilValor where num_platilla=@cve_puesto) begin SELECT E.descripcion AS Seccion, '['+ STUFF((SELECT ',{"key":"'+CAST(b.cve_seccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(b.cve_subseccion,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX))+'","name":"'+ B.descripcion +'","multi":"'+ case when cve_tipocatalogo=2 then '1' else '0' end +'","compuesto":"'+ case when cve_tipocatalogo=3 then (Select descripcion+'-'+label1 + '-' +label2 from ES_catpermae WHERE cve_catalogo=b.cve_catalogo AND activo=1 ) else '0' end +'","catalogo":{' +ISNULL( STUFF(( SELECT ',"'+ CAST(B.cve_catalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(D.cve_subcatalogo,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'":"'+ descripcion +'|' + case when ISNULL(valor1,'')='' then 'null' else char(39)+valor1+char(39) end + '-' + case when ISNULL(valor2,'')='' then 'null' else char(39)+valor2+char(39) end +'"' FROM ES_catperdet D WHERE (cve_catalogo=B.cve_catalogo and activo=1) FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,''),'')+'}}' FROM ES_pstperfilsubseccion B WHERE B.activo=1 AND B.cve_seccion=F.cve_seccion --AND B.cve_subseccion=F.cve_subsecuencia FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'')+']' AS JSON FROM ES_pstperfilseccion E INNER JOIN Es_PstPerfilValor F ON E.cve_seccion=F.cve_seccion WHERE num_platilla=@cve_puesto GROUP BY F.cve_seccion,E.descripcion END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT E.descripcion AS Seccion, '['+ STUFF((SELECT ',{"key":"'+CAST(b.cve_seccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(b.cve_subseccion,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX))+'","name":"'+ B.descripcion +'","multi":"'+ case when cve_tipocatalogo=2 then '1' else '0' end +'","compuesto":"'+ case when cve_tipocatalogo=3 then (Select descripcion+'-'+label1 + '-' +label2 from ES_catpermae WHERE cve_catalogo=b.cve_catalogo AND activo=1 ) else '0' end +'","catalogo":{' +ISNULL( STUFF(( SELECT ',"'+ CAST(B.cve_catalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + '-'+ CAST(ISNULL(D.cve_subcatalogo,0) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'":"'+ descripcion +'|' + case when ISNULL(valor1,'')='' then 'null' else char(39)+valor1+char(39) end + '-' + case when ISNULL(valor2,'')='' then 'null' else char(39)+valor2+char(39) end +'"' FROM ES_catperdet D WHERE (cve_catalogo=B.cve_catalogo and activo=1) FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,''),'')+'}}' FROM ES_pstperfilsubseccion B WHERE B.activo=1 AND B.cve_seccion=F.cve_seccion --AND B.cve_subseccion=F.cve_subsecuencia FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'')+']' AS JSON FROM ES_pstperfilseccion E INNER JOIN ES_pstPerfilSecciones F ON E.cve_seccion=F.cve_seccion WHERE F.cve_perfil=@cve_perfil GROUP BY F.cve_seccion,E.descripcion end

guardar.sql: BEGIN TRANSACTION BEGIN TRY DELETE Es_PstPerfilValor WHERE num_platilla=@cve_puesto DECLARE @QRY VARCHAR(8000) = 'INSERT INTO Es_PstPerfilValor( num_platilla ,cve_seccion ,cve_subseccion ,numero ,publicar ,cve_catalogo ,cve_subcatalogo ,valor1 ,valor2 ,desvalor ,fechaModificacion) VALUES' + @valores EXEC(@QRY) COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK TRANSACTION SELECT -1 AS estatus, 'Error: ' + @QRY mensaje END CATCH

mostrarparaeditar.sql: SET LANGUAGE Español; select num_platilla, CONVERT(char(10),ISNULL(fechaModificacion,GETDATE()),103) AS 'fechaModificacion', CONVERT(char(2),DATEPART(DAY,ISNULL(fechaModificacion,GETDATE()))) +' de '+ DATENAME(MONTH,ISNULL(fechaModificacion,GETDATE())) + ' del ' + CONVERT(char(4),DATEPART(YEAR,ISNULL(fechaModificacion,GETDATE()))) AS 'FECHA', '['+ STUFF(( select ',{"key":"'+ CAST(cve_seccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'-'+CAST(cve_subseccion AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'","valor":"'+ isnull(desvalor,'null') +'","publico":"'+CAST(publicar AS VARCHAR(MAX)) +'","catalogo":{'+ STUFF(( select ',"'+ ISNULL(CAST(cve_catalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'-'+ ISNULL(CAST(cve_subcatalogo AS VARCHAR(MAX)),'null') +'":"'+ ISNULL(char(39)+CAST(valor1 AS VARCHAR(MAX))+char(39),'null') +'-'+ ISNULL(char(39)+CAST(valor2 AS VARCHAR(MAX))+char(39),'null') +'"' from Es_PstPerfilValor where num_platilla=a.num_platilla and cve_seccion=b.cve_seccion and cve_subseccion=b.cve_subseccion ORDER BY NUMERO FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)'),1,1,'') +'}}' from Es_PstPerfilValor b where num_platilla=a.num_platilla --and cve_seccion=a.cve_seccion --and cve_subseccion=a.cve_subseccion ORDER BY NUMERO FOR XML PATH(''),TYPE).value('(./text())[1]','VARCHAR(MAX)'),1,1,'') +']' AS JSON from Es_PstPerfilValor a where num_platilla=@cve_puesto group by num_platilla,fechaModificacion SET LANGUAGE us_english;
